concept.title: Cloudera Impala Variables

conbody.p:
Substitution variables for denoting features available in release X or higher. The upstream docs can refer to the Impala release number. The docs included with a distro can refer to the distro release number by editing the values here.
CDH 5.8
CDH 5.7
CDH 5.6
CDH 5.5
CDH 5.4
CDH 5.3
CDH 5.2
CDH 5.1
CDH 5.0
Banner for examples showing shell version - (Shell build version: Impala Shell v2.3.x (hash) built on date)
Banner for examples showing impalad version -Server version: impalad version 2.3.x (build x.y.z)

foreign.lines: This is the documentation for . Documentation for other versions is available at Cloudera Documentation.
